# Class MatchedKeywordsData

Collection of keyword matches.

Contains an array of keyword match results from keyword detection operations.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

destroy getMatchers

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new MatchedKeywordsData(external: any): [MatchedKeywordsData]()

Constructs a new MatchedKeywords instance.

#### Parameters

    * external: any

The external reference to create the instance from

#### Returns [MatchedKeywordsData]()

Overrides BaseData.constructor




## Methods

### destroy

Cleans up resources associated with this data.

#### Returns void

Inherited from BaseData.destroy




### getMatchers

  * getMatchers(): [KeywordMatchInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_keyword_match.KeywordMatchInterface)[]

Retrieves the matches.

#### Returns [KeywordMatchInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_keyword_match.KeywordMatchInterface)[]

An array of keyword matches, or undefined if no matches are found
